parameters.name: page
parameters.description: If this parameter is specified, standard pagination will be performed, returning the users corresponding to the indicated page (0 based indexed) for the indicated page size. For example: page=2&pageSize=10 will return the results (20-29). The results will be sorted by descending creation date.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Maximum number of users to be returned. If not specified, 20 users will be returned by default..

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: If the "page" parameter has not been specified, the search will use cursor-based pagination. Each search result will include a nextPageToken field in the "meta" section. This nextPageToken must be included as a pageToken in the following request in order to get the next page of users. The initial search should not include pageToken. The results will always be returned ordered by descending creation date.

parameters.name: usernameStartsWith
parameters.description: Name of the user you want to search for. Results whose username begins with this value will be returned.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Users created prior to the date will be returned.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Users created after the date will be returned.

parameters.name: stateIn
parameters.description: Users whose state matches one of the values in this array will be returned.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: If this parameter is specified, standard pagination will be performed, returning the applications corresponding to the indicated page (0 based indexed) for the indicated page size. For example: page=2&pageSize=10 will return the results (20-29). The results will be sorted by descending creation date.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Maximum number of applications to be returned. If not specified, 20 applications will be returned by default..

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: If the "page" parameter has not been specified, the search will use cursor-based pagination. Each search result will include a nextPageToken field in the "meta" section. This nextPageToken must be included as a pageToken in the following request in order to get the next page of applications. The initial search should not include pageToken. The results will always be returned ordered by descending creation date.

parameters.name: merchant
parameters.description: Applications whose merchant code matches one of the values in this array will be returned.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Applications created after the date will be returned.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Applications created prior to the date will be returned.

parameters.name: signed
parameters.description: If "signed" is true it will recover applications with offers whose signature method equals to SIGNED_MANUAL, SIGNED_SMS or SIGNED_BIOMETRIC. If "signed" is false will recover applications with offers whose signature method is unset.

parameters.name: docsSubmitted
parameters.description: Applications whose documents are submitted or not.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The application states to filter with.

parameters.name: offerState
parameters.description: Applications whose offers states equal to the values.

parameters.name: lender
parameters.description: Applications whose selected offer lender code equals to the values.

parameters.name: registrationNumber
parameters.description: Applications whose motor vehicle registration number equals to the value.

parameters.name: vin
parameters.description: Applications whose motor vehicle vin number equals to the value.

parameters.name: offerDocsSubmitted
parameters.description: If true, will return applications with offers whose state equals to PREAPPROVED or PENDING_REVIEW with uploaded documents unsent.

parameters.name: isNotCancelled
parameters.description: Applications whose state is not CANCELED.

parameters.name: createdByUsername
parameters.description: Applications created by the user (username) you want to search for. Results whose username begins with this value will be returned.

parameters.name: createdByDocIdNumber
parameters.description: Applications created by the user with an identification document number.

parameters.name: groupCode
parameters.description: Applications belonging to the group code values.

parameters.name: readableId
parameters.description: Retrieves the application whose readable id number equals to the value.

parameters.name: province
parameters.description: Applications whose main's applicant address province equals to the value.

parameters.name: surname
parameters.description: Applications whose main's applicant surname contains the value.

parameters.name: docIdNumber
parameters.description: Applications whose main's applicant doc id number equals to the value.

parameters.name: productType
parameters.description: Applications whose financial product type equals to the value.

parameters.name: goodsType
parameters.description: Applications whose code associated to the good/service sold equals to the value.

parameters.name: fromPreapprovalDate
parameters.description: Applications whose pre-approval date is after the date will be returned.

parameters.name: untilPreapprovalDate
parameters.description: Applications whose pre-approval date is prior to the date will be returned.

parameters.name: fromApprovalDate
parameters.description: Applications whose approval date is after the date will be returned.

parameters.name: untilApprovalDate
parameters.description: Applications whose approval date is prior to the date will be returned.

parameters.name: fromDocsSubmissionDate
parameters.description: Applications whose docs submission date is after the date will be returned.

parameters.name: untilDocsSubmissionDate
parameters.description: Applications whose docs submission date is prior to the date will be returned.

parameters.name: fromPayoutDate
parameters.description: Applications whose payout date is after the date will be returned.

parameters.name: untilPayoutDate
parameters.description: Applications whose payout date is prior to the date will be returned.

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Applications whose selected offer term equals to the value.

parameters.name: feeType
parameters.description: Applications whose selected offer product type equals to the value.

parameters.name: fromLoanAmount
parameters.description: Applications whose selected offer loan amount is greater or equal than the value.

parameters.name: untilLoanAmount
parameters.description: Applications whose selected offer loan amount is lower or equal than the value.

message.description: A human readable message about the error that may include tips on how to fix the error

detailedMessage.description: A developer focused message with more detailed information about the error that occurred

errorCode.description: A code that identifies the error, can be used programmatically since it's unique

validationErrors.description: An object that contains the validation errors, if there are any

errorId.description: A UUID that uniquely identifies the error. If you need help debugging the error you can pass this ID to Lendismart's staff

Error.description: Will be returned when an error occurs when calling the API

fieldName.description: The fieldName that did not pass the validation

message.description: A human readable message that explains why the validation did not pass

ValidationError.description: Represents a validation error for a specific field

creationDate.description: Timestamp that indicates when the user has been created

cityCode.description: The INE (Instituto Nacional de Estadística) code of the city.

localityCode.description: The INE (Instituto Nacional de Estadística) code of the locality.

fullAddress.description: Optional field, use this field when you store the whole address as a string instead of multiple fields.

role.description: The role the applicant has in the loan application

relationship.description: The relationship this applicant has with the MAIN_APPLICANT. Should be specified only when the role is not MAIN_APPLICANT. If it's specified when the role is MAIN applicant a validation error will be thrown

docIdType.description: The type of the identification document

docIdType2.description: The type of the second identification document (only available in some countries such as Portugal)

docIdNumber.description: The actual value of the identification document

docIdNumber2.description: The actual value of the second identification document (only available in some countries such as Portugal)

docIdExpirationDate.description: Expiration date of the identification number ('9999-01-01' in the case of perpetual documents)

nationalityIso.description: The ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 code of the nationality country

nationality2Iso.description: The ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 code of the second nationality country

paymentMethod.description: The payment method to be used

cardNumber.description: The credit card number. Empty spaces and non alphanumeric characters will be removed. This field should have a value only when the paymentMethod field is CREDIT_CARD

accountNumber.description: The account number, should only by specified when the paymentMethod is CCC. It can be either an account number or an IBAN

accountCreationDate.description: The date when the account specified in the previous field (accountNumber) has been created

residencyStartDate.description: The date when the applicant started his/her residency. Should only be specified when the docIdType is not NATIONAL_ID

residencyEndDate.description: The date when the applicant ends his/her residency. Should only be specified when the docIdType is not NATIONAL_ID

dependent.description: The number of dependant persons the applicant has (children, ancestors, or both)

housingTenureType.description: Type of property ownership / tenure of the house where the applicant lives

housingTenureStartDate.description: The date when the applicant started to live in the house described by the previous field (housingTenureType)

otherExpenses.description: Other monthly expenses the applicant may have, existing loans etc.

occupation.description: The specific occupation the applicant has

profession.description: If the applicant is a salaried employee, the applicant's profession

jobTitle.description: If the applicant is a salaried employee, the applicant's job title / level of responsibility

industryType.description: The industry area in which the applicant's work takes place (only applies to public / private employees and the self-employed)

industry.description: The specific industry in which the applicant's work takes place (only applies to public / private employees and the self-employed)

contractStartDate.description: Starting date of the applicant's current job (only applies to public / private employees)

contractEndDate.description: Contract end job of the applicant's current job (only applies to temporary public / private employees)

companyPhone.description: The applicant's working telephone number (only applies to public / private employees and the self-employed)

companyName.description: Name of the company where the applicant works (only applies to public / private employees)

monthlyIncome.description: The applicant's monthly net income (it may be subject to proof of income)

incomeFrequency.description: Number of pay periods in which the applicant's annual income is paid, usually 12/14 (it doesn't apply to the self employed)

consentGroup.description: Indicates if the applicant has already given its consent to the merchant's policies

Applicant.description: Represents the person that is going to apply for a loan.

applicants.description: Represents the collection of applicants who are applying for a loan. At least one applicant is required

sendLeadEmail.description: If the flag is true an email will be sent to the main applicant informing him/her that an Application has been created. Please note that if this flag is set to true,  the MAIN_APPLICANT's email field should have a valid value. Also, if this flag is true the managedBy field will be set to APPLICANT automatically

phoneValidationRequired.description: If the flag is false mobile phone validation will be skipped

signatureDisabled.description: If this flag is true the signature will be disabled until it is set to false

managedBy.description: Indicates who is responsible for managing the Application creation and submission

applicationTtlSec.description: Indicates for how long you as as merchant are willing to keep an application alive in seconds. This value will determine for how long the 'token' field will be valid. If this field is not specified and the 'managedBy' field is set to APPLICANT, a default value of one week will be assigned

sessionTtlSec.description: Indicates how long the session in Lendismart will last in seconds once you've opened the widget via the 'openCheckout' method of the JavaScript SDK or you have redirected the user to the applicantUrl. You should try to align the Lendismart session ttl with you own session ttl. Only applies if the 'managedBy' field is set to APPLICANT.

primaryColor.description: Allows for the customization of the UI color (only applies to applications 'managed by applicant'). It should be passed as the color's hexadecimal code preceded by a #

showDenials.description: Indicates if denied offers must be shown to the applicant

Billing.description: Information relate to the billing person.

eventsURL.description: The URL we will POST event information when an event occurs

eventTypes.description: The events that you want to be notified about. If left empty or null we will assume that you're interested in all of them.

items.description: The events that you want to be notified about. If left empty or null we will assume that you're interested in all of them.

Events.description: Holds information about the events e.g. callback url, event types you're interested in ...

type.description: Type of good or service sold.

quantity.description: Quantity of the item included in the order.

price.description: Price per unit of the item (including any tax and/or discount). The calculation of the unit price is: price = (preTaxPrice - discount) * (1 + taxRate)

preTaxPrice.description: Pre-tax price per unit of the item.

discount.description: Discount per unit of the item (in currency units).

taxRate.description: Article tax rate, expressed as a decimal (e.g. '0.21').

reference.description: Serial number / reference of the item.

url.description: Product page URL in the shop.

Item.description: Optional field that represents the collection items included in the order (by default this field is not required).

requestedAmount.description: The amount of the loan, the value should be less than 100,000

maxMonthlyPayment.description: The maximum monthly instalment the applicant is willing to pay for the loan

term.description: The desired number of terms in which the loan will be payed.

financingPromotion.description: Some businesses offer special promotions when the goods or services sold are financed (i.e. this is a very common practice in the Motor industry). In such cases, this field indicates the discount in currency units.

productType.description: The desired financial product type (e.g. interest-free, interest-bearing, etc.)

openingFeePct.description: The desired maximum opening fee (expressed as a decimal)

maxNir.description: The desired maximum nominal interest rate (expressed as a decimal)

feePaymentType.description: The preferred type of fee payment (if not zero)

gracePeriod.description: The desired grace period in months - initial period during which the loan doesn't have to be repaid

monthlyDueDate.description: The preferred date of the month on which the payment will be due (not every lender takes it into account)

insurance.description: Indicates whether preference should be given to offers that include (true) or don't include (false) an insurance

noAccount.description: If true, it indicates that the customer doesn't have the account number on hand (certain lenders are able to score applications without the account number, although it must be provided later if preapproved)

applicantType.description: It indicates whether the applicant is an individual or a company

maxMerchantCost.description: It indicates the maximum cost (in currency units) the merchant is willing to bear to subsidize loan interests

maxMerchantCostPct.description: It indicates the maximum cost (expressed as a decimal) the merchant is willing to bear to subsidize loan interests

LoanDetails.description: Represents the loan details of an Application

code.description: The code of the Merchant, a list of codes was provided to you by Lendismart's team.

user.description: The username of the user that will perform the operation.

redirectUrl.description: The URL you would like Lendismart to redirect the customer after the signature and documentation upload has been completed. Only applies if the 'managedBy' field is set to 'APPLICANT'.

redirectAfterScoring.description: Indicates if you'd like us to redirect the user to the redirectUrl after the scoring has finished.

emailAfterScoring.description: Indicates if you'd like us to email the user after the scoring has finished in order to inform the scoring result.

Merchant.description: Represents the merchant from where the loan application is being submitted

goodsType.description: Code associated to the good/service sold. The available codes are dependant on the specific merchant and must be provided by Lendismart.

serviceDuration.description: The duration of the service/s sold (it doesn't apply to the sale of goods).

reference.description: This field can be used by the merchant to identify the order to which the loan is referring.

purchaseAmount.description: The total amount of the purchase.

items.description: Optional field that represents the collection items included in the order (by default this field is not required).

Order.description: Includes the details of the good or service that is going to be financed

rating.description: Customer rating according to the merchant's own scoring.

lastLogin.description: Timestamp of the customer's last login to the merchant's online shop.

completedOrdersCount.description: Number of orders completed by the customer since the account was created.

completedOrdersAmount.description: Total amount spent on orders completed by the customer since the account was created.

previousOrders.description: List of the customer's most recent orders (up to 10).

Order history.description: Customer history in the merchant's shop

state.description: Order status according to Lendismart's categories.

statusName.description: Order status according to the merchant's own categories.

paymentMethod.description: Payment method according to Lendismart's categories.

paymentMethodName.description: Payment method according to the merchant's own categories.

postalCode.description: Postal code to which the order was shipped.

countryIso.description: The ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 code of the country to which the order was shipped.

method.description: Shipping method according to Lendismart's categories.

methodName.description: Shipping method according to the merchant's categories.

provider.description: Courier providing the shipping service, if applicable.

price.description: Shipping price (including any tax and/or discount). The calculation is as follows: price = (preTaxPrice - discount) * (1 + taxRate)

taxRate.description: Shipping tax rate, expressed as a decimal.

Shipping.description: Information relate to the order shipping.

firstRegistrationDate.description: Date was the vehicle was first registered

mileage.description: The number of kilometers traveled by the vehicle

Vehicle.description: Information related to the vehicle we're asking the loan for. Only needed when the goodsType is related to vehicles.

id.description: The main identifier of the Application

applicants.description: Represents the collection of applicants who are applying for a loan. At least one applicant is required

sendLeadEmail.description: If the flag is true an email will be sent to the main applicant informing him/her that an Application has been created. Please note that if this flag is set to true,  the MAIN_APPLICANT's email field should have a valid value. Also, if this flag is true the managedBy field will be set to APPLICANT automatically

phoneValidationRequired.description: If the flag is false mobile phone validation will be skipped

signatureDisabled.description: If this flag is true the signature will be disabled until it is set to false

managedBy.description: Indicates who is responsible for managing the Application creation and submission

applicationTtlSec.description: Indicates for how long you as as merchant are willing to keep an application alive in seconds. This value will determine for how long the 'token' field will be valid. If this field is not specified and the 'managedBy' field is set to APPLICANT, a default value of one week will be assigned

sessionTtlSec.description: Indicates how long the session in Lendismart will last in seconds once you've opened the widget via the 'openCheckout' method of the JavaScript SDK or you have redirected the user to the applicantUrl. You should try to align the Lendismart session ttl with you own session ttl. Only applies if the 'managedBy' field is set to APPLICANT.

primaryColor.description: Allows for the customization of the UI color (only applies to applications 'managed by applicant'). It should be passed as the color's hexadecimal code preceded by a #

showDenials.description: Indicates if denied offers must be shown to the applicant

comments.description: Comments you may want to make about this particular Application can be placed here

readableId.description: The secondary identifier of the Application. It's more user friendly and UI oriented

applicationUiUrl.description: URL where the Application can be accessed in Lendismart's UI

applicantUrl.description: URL where the Applicant should be pointed to when a merchant needs the Applicant to sign the contract and upload the documentation and does not want to use the JavaScript SDK for this purpose.

token.description: Token that is meant to be used in the browser in order to open the checkout widget

creationDate.description: Timestamp that indicates when the Application has been created

cancellationDate.description: Timestamp that indicates when the Application has been cancelled

cancellationReason.description: The reason why the application got cancelled

clonedFromId.description: If the Application has been cloned from another Application, it represents de Id of the original Application

clonedFromReadableId.description: If the Application has been cloned from another Application, it represents de readableId of the original Application

state.description: The state the Application, checkout the docs for a detailed explanation about the different available states

paymentAuthorizationCode.description: When applicable, payment authorization code used for the settlement of the purchase price

source.description: Represents where was the application created in initially

id.description: The unique identifier of the Insurance

Insurance.description: Represents an insurance included in a motor loan offer

id.description: The unique identifier of the Offer

lenderApplicationId1.description: The identifier assigned by the Lender to the Offer, which may be helpful for the resolution of incidents

lenderApplicationId2.description: Some lenders assign two different identifiers to an Offer

lenderSignatureId.description: Some lenders provide a code for the identification of the digital signature session, which may be helpful for the resolution of incidents

lender.description: The lender providing the loan offer

submissionOrder.description: Order in which the Offer was sent to its corresponding Lender (among all Offers)

signatureMethodUsed.description: Method used for the signature of the loan contract by the applicant/s

signatureDate.description: Timestamp that indicates when the Offer has been signed

preapprovalDate.description: Timestamp that indicates when the Offer has been preapproved

approvalDate.description: Timestamp that indicates when the Offer has been approved

payOutDate.description: Timestamp that indicates when the loan funds have been paid out to the merchant

returnedDate.description: Timestamp that indicates when the Offer has been returned

docsSubmitted.description: Whether the documents related to the application have been sent to the lender

firstDocsSubmissionDate.description: Timestamp that indicates when the documents related to the application were sent to the lender for the first time

cancellationDate.description: Timestamp that indicates when the Offer was cancelled

errorType.description: Type of error preventing the scoring of the Offer by the lender

error.description: Text detailing the error preventing the scoring of the Offer by the lender

incidentType.description: Type of incident preventing the approval of tht Offer

incident.description: Text detailing the incident preventing the approval of the Offer

loanAmount.description: The amount that could be financed through the Offer (it might differ from the requested amount if maximum/minimum thresholds apply)

monthlyPayment.description: The monthly instalment the applicant will have to pay for the loan

productCode.description: Identifier of the specific financial product in the Lendismart, defined by its main characteristics (lender, term, productType, etc.)

term.description: The number of terms in which the loan will be payed

productType.description: The financial product type (e.g. interest-free, interest-bearing, etc.)

nir.description: The nominal interest rate associated to the Offer

apr.description: The annual percentage rate associated to the Offer

openingFeePct.description: The  opening fee (per currency unit) associated to the Offer

feePaymentType.description: The type of fee payment (if not zero)

openingFeeUpfrontPayment.description: If the opening fee is greater than zero and the feePaymentType is 'UPFRONT', the upfront payment associated to it

openingFeeCost.description: Opening fee cost, wether paid upfront or financed over the course of the loan

gracePeriod.description: The grace period in months - initial period during which the loan doesn't have to be repaid

insurance.description: Whether the Offer embeds an insurance product

insurancePaymentType.description: If the Offer includes an insurance product, this field indicates if the insurance cost is finance or financed and included in the loan monthly payment

insuranceUpfrontPayment.description: If the Offer includes an insurance product and the insurancePaymentType is 'UPFRONT', the upfront payment associated to it

merchantCost.description: Cost of the loan to the merchant (discount)

downPayment.description: Down payment to be paid by the applicant in relation with the Offer

downPaymentStatus.description: Status of the down payment. It will be set to NOT_DUE if it mustn't be paid through Lendismart (e.g. to be paid in cash). It will be set to COMPLETED when it has already been paid

downPaymentTimestamp.description: Timestamp that indicates when the down payment status changed to COMPLETED

returnState.description: State of the return of an approved loan

partialReturns.description: Partial returns associated to the offer

Offer.description: Represents one of the loan options provided by a specific lender

id.description: The unique identifier of the PartialReturn

amount.description: Partial return amount (requested or completed, depending on the returnState)

returnDate.description: Timestamp that indicates when the down payment status changed to COMPLETED

PartialReturn.description: Represents each of the partial returns requested in relation with an approved offer

id.description: The unique identifier of the Payment

externalId.description: External identifier of the Payment Plan

paymentPlanId.description: The unique identifier of the Payment Plan

type.description: Type of payment (initial, recurrent, final, etc.)

paymentMethod.description: Payment method used (e.g. VISA, MASTERCARD, SEPA debit, etc.)

amountRefunded.description: Amount that has been refunded in relation with the Payment

costs.description: Represents the collection of costs from a payment

processorPaymentId.description: Id used by the payment processor to uniquely identify the Payment

currency.description: Currency in which the Payment is denominated

dueDate.description: Instant when the Payment becomes due

paymentDate.description: Instant when the Payment was successfully paid

amount.description: Cost amount charged for the payment processing

description.description: Description of the cost (e.g. '0.3% of payment amount'

PaymentCost.description: Represents the collection of costs from a payment

amount.description: Return amount (requested or completed, depending on the returnState)

ReturnRequest.description: Represents an offer return requested in relation with an approved offer

merchantCode.description: The code of the Merchant, a list of codes was provided to you by Lendismart's team.

goodsTypeCode.description: Code associated to the good/service sold. The available codes are dependant on the specific merchant and must be provided by Lendismart.

purchaseAmount.description: The total amount of the purchase.

requestedAmount.description: The amount of the loan, the value should be less than 100,000

applicantType.description: It indicates whether the applicant is an individual or a company

maxMonthlyPayment.description: The maximum monthly instalment the applicant is willing to pay for the loan

maxNominalAnnualRate.description: The maximum nominal annual rate to apply

productType.description: The desired financial product type (e.g. interest-free, interest-bearing, etc.)

paymentFrequency.description: Frequency of loan repayments (e.g., monthly, quarterly, annually)

instalmentType.description: Type of loan payments (end-of-period vs beginning-of-period)

firstRegistrationDate.description: Date was the vehicle was first registered

serviceDuration.description: The duration of the service/s sold (it doesn't apply to the sale of goods).

lender.description: If included, only products associated to this lender will be considered

feePaymentType.description: The preferred type of fee payment (if not zero)

term.description: The desired number of terms in which the loan will be payed.

gracePeriod.description: The desired grace period in months - initial period during which the loan doesn't have to be repaid

maxMerchantCost.description: It indicates the maximum cost (in currency units) the merchant is willing to bear to subsidize loan interests

maxMerchantCostPct.description: It indicates the maximum cost (per currency unit of the loan amount) the merchant is willing to bear to subsidize loan interests

openingFeePct.description: The desired maximum opening fee (per currency unit)

withInsurance.description: Whether the loan includes an insurance or not.

occupation.description: The specific occupation the applicant has

insuranceCoverages.description: Set of insurance coverages included in the loan

items.description: Set of insurance coverages included in the loan

purchaseAmount.description: The total amount of the purchase.

loanAmount.description: The amount that could be financed through the loan (it might differ from the requested amount if maximum/minimum thresholds apply)

term.description: The desired number of terms in which the loan will be payed.

gracePeriod.description: The desired grace period in months - initial period during which the loan doesn't have to be repaid

openingFeePct.description: The desired maximum opening fee (per currency unit)

openingFeeCost.description: Opening fee cost, wether paid upfront or financed over the course of the loan

openingFeeUpfront.description: If the opening fee is greater than zero and the feePaymentType is 'UPFRONT', the opening fee upfront associated to it

insuranceUpfront.description: If the loan includes an insurance product and the insurancePaymentType is 'UPFRONT', the insurance upfront associated to it

productType.description: The desired financial product type (e.g. interest-free, interest-bearing, etc.)

productTypeLabel.description: The translated productType label according to languageTag code

feePaymentType.description: The preferred type of fee payment (if not zero)

nir.description: The nominal annual rate to apply

apr.description: The annual percentage rate to apply

hasInsurance.description: Whether the loan includes an insurance or not.

downPayment.description: Down payment to be paid by the applicant in relation with the loan

monthlyPayment.description: The monthly instalment the applicant will have to pay for the loan

finalPayment.description: Final payment to be paid in relation with the loan

totalPayments.description: Total payments to be paid in relation with the loan

totalInterest.description: Total interest to be paid in relation with the loan

simulationMessage.description: Detailed descriptions of the financial terms of the loan

merchantCost.description: Cost of the loan to the merchant (discount, if positive), or intermediation commission (if negative)

lenderCode.description: Code of the lender associated with the product returned in the simulation.

lenderName.description: Name of the lender associated with the product returned in the simulation.

lenders.description: Code of the available lenders whose products were considered in the simulation results.

items.description: Code of the available lenders whose products were considered in the simulation results.

goodsTypeCode.description: Code associated to the good/service sold.

total.description: Total number of results in searches with standard pagination.

nextPageToken.description: Token used in cursor pagination to get the next page of results.

hasMore.description: Indicates if there is another page with results.
